labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It is overlapped by the colour picker.
data.expected_result: You should easily be able to access this menu and do any command.
data.short_description: In the Role Colour Picker, the copy, paste, cut menu is layered under the colour picker.
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1: Create a random colour - Step 2: Attempt to copy the random colour code but press right click, instead of any shortcut keys.
